ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I feel angry that the political and economic system that we live in harms the climate
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am outraged that politicians allowed climate change to come this far.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel outraged at corporations that harm the climate.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel anger when I think of politicians who delay efforts to mitigate climate change.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: The increasing public engagement with climate change gives me hope.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I believe that there are emerging solutions that will allow us to stop climate change.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Concrete actions for the climate allow me to be optimistic about the future.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Social mobilization in the fight against climate change makes me feel that together we can achieve this goal
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Thinking about climate change makes me fear for the future of our children.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am overwhelmed by the awareness of the approaching climate disaster.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Everything seems uncertain because of climate change.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I fear how climate change will affect me and my loved ones
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: The thought of so many species going extinct under the pressure of climate change fills me with sorrow.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: The thought that the world I know is disappearing forever because of climate change makes me sad.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel sorry about the possibilities we are losing forever because of climate change.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am sad that so many living creatures suffer because of climate change.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree
